item.description: well, December was one big fat blur, and I have no idea where January's been going, so let us finally get together again, in February, the love month.  Love love love me some February.  Hope ya'll can make it!!  bring your favorite beverage, a snack to share, your loving and fun attitude and voila!  See you soon!!  Mindy

group.name: The North of Boston Euchre Meetup

item.name: LOVE me some Euchre- Febuary (aka: about time) Euchre meetup
